content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv late last night, when i felt a urge to get up and look out the window next to me. it was strange to me, i ignored it because i was tired. but in a few seconds i felt an urge to go to the window again. i got up and went to the window. i looked up towards the direction of the moon and there was a strange looking light flying by below the moon. i told my girlfriend about it and how i felt like something was telling me to look out the window. so we went outside to get a better look. by this time the object was pretty much directly above us. it was pretty low, by my best guess i would say it was 500ft. up. she was commenting on how low it was and getting pretty scared. at this time i was looking around the sky above us and noticed there were at least 3-4 more of these "lights" spread out across an area of about 2-3 blocks, some of them seemed to be higher up than others. when i noticed how many of them there were they all stopped moving at once. the first one i saw was directly above us, just silently hovering there. the lights seemed to be changing color from white to red to green to blue very rapidly. there weren't multiple lights on each object, it was only one light changing color. we ran inside to get a camera but my camera battery was dead. so i grabbed my phone, that was also dead. finally i grabbed my tablet that was on a charger at the time, but it doesn't have the best camera on it. i also grabbed a pair of binoculars and a small hand held telescope. by the time we got back outside a couple of the lights were gone. the one above us was still there and one a little to the left from our front porch (north). and another off to the west pretty far. the one above us was higher up than when we went inside, it was about 1000 ft. or more now, i couldn't really tell. but the amount of light it gave off didn't appear to change from when it was right above us. same with the other 2. they were slowly moving upwards. i recorded them on my tablet for a minute or 2 and took about 10 photos. but i can't really see anything on the tablet. maybe once i transfer the video and images to a computer they will be more visible. i looked at a couple of the lights with the binoculars and they didn't appear to have any structure at all, just a spot of light changing color. by this time they started moving away, towards the west. a slightly different course than before they stopped. then my girlfriend saw another light coming from the south east, i looked at this with the binoculars and could tell it was a jet i could see the shape and lights of it and after a few seconds could hear the engins. this was much higher up than the lights too. when we saw the jet the other lights started moving away at a pretty high rate of speed. the jet was a large one, i don't know if it was a civilian or military jet but it looked like one of them large military jets like a c5 or what ever there called. the big ones with the radar on them. it was following the same course as the lights. i should also say that it was a perfectly clear night, not a cloud in the sky. the whole experience felt strange. why i would get up to look out the window at 1:30 in the morning is beyond me. it just felt like something was drawing me to do it, and when i did the object was right there.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4-5 lights flew over house, thought were sattelites at first until i noticed how many there were and how low they were when they got above me and stopped moving.

content.detailedDescription: Was walking to a friends house. i could sense something in the sky behind me. i turned around and in the sky was a very bright star. within about 3 seconds of looking at this star the star shot away from the earth in an incredible speed! a split second it was gone! i thought the object was a very bright star. i was shocked to see this star blast off the way it did. even today i still can`t believe what i saw. that is why i like to report it. this is one of 2 sightings. i reported the other to mufon also. case 68814. both these events happened many years ago. i am just reporting them now.
content.summary: Very bright star in sky. when i looked at this star within 3 seconds and then it took off away from the earth in a split second.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on back stair way talking with 3 other people when i noticed a light in the sky . it had appeared out of nowhere didnt see it fly in like a normal aircraft would appear. the time was 10:05 pm on july 30 2015 the three other people also witnessed this entire event. the object was over the north end of town. pulsating white light changing sporatically into all other colors in nno sequence. when light was pulsating it appered to be circular in shape.A plane flew towards the craft going underneath it. once the plane passed the craft started moving westward across the night sky. when the craft got closer it appered to be triange shape with 2 white lights at the axis of the triange. a red light was in the front with a green light inbetween the 2 white lights. we observed the craft for 15 minutes time was 10:20 when the craft was no longer in veiw.We know it was not a plane because the lights were not consistant with position of where they were. we reported the sighting with wlfi news team of lafayette, indiana
content.summary: Object appered out of nowhere whenlights where palsating it appered cylander in shape as it flew away it was triangle

content.detailedDescription: Object flew over us. then hovered over roadway. we followed it on bikes. watched it from nearby park. it hovered for about 20 minutes. made no sound. movement was very steady. it then slowly moved again. we followed it on our bikes until it was too far away to see anymore. we where teenagers in the park hanging out. the object flew over us and made no sound. had no idea what it first was. fore sure not an airplane or helicopter. the object moved slowly and then hovered. it`s movement was extremely steady. my reaction was amazement. i wished i had a camera. i am now 51 years old. this happened when i was about 17 years old i am guessing. i didn`t record exact time and date etc...
content.summary: Ufo was rectangle shape orange colour. moved slowly and then hovered for about 20 minutes. no sound. very steady movement. then slowly moved again.

content.detailedDescription: I live in memphis tn.In 1977 around 9 o'clock i was going to a neighbors house that lived five doors away. i got under the street light that is in our cove when i saw a shadow above my head as i looked up i saw an enormous triangle shaped object in the air.It got close to me and stopped.It hoovered in the air and then pointed it's nose down toward me.I noticed the lights on the bottom and when it pointed toward me i could see a frosted type window with figures behind the glass. i could see two sides of the ufo. i was a kid so i didn't know what it was but i knew i had  never seen anything like it. it looked like it was made out of some type of metal,such as stainless steel without the shine of stainless steel.It had three lights on the underside. i don't know how long it was over me but i do know that i was petrified. it then leveled back off and started moving away from me heading east. i watched it start moving and the only sound coming from it was a hiss, like air being let out of a tire. i watched it until i could no longer see any part of object. i then ran home and went to my bedroom and sat and prayed that what i had seen was not real(but it was)7. i've told this story at least a hundred times and on one occasion i had a friend that worked as a memphis fireman come from across the room and told me he saw the same thing along with his wife ,kids,and a friend.I would love to be put under hypnosis and draw what i saw.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangle disc stopped overhead and hoovered for awhile then tilted slightly upward and floated away. sounded like air coming out of tire as it flew away

content.detailedDescription: Whilst stood in my back yard i saw two objects flying erratically in the sky,i got my camera and took a couple of photos.
content.summary: Two illuminated objects flying in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Spotted multiple craft following from the north west to north east and south east track the objects (3) broke off into multiple directions while emitting some type of flash away from the objects at right angles but always at same approximate distance from the objects as if the objects themselves were launching some type of chaff. 
the event lasted about ten minutes with all three objects emitting the same "flash" away from their body. if i were to guess id say the altitude was approximately 60'000 ft or greater with no noise. 
myself and the other individual both made note of this. 

similar events have been happening over the past month with very bright objects moving in among the cloud formations in multiples with again no sound to accompany suggesting that the craft themselves do not have jet engine. 

the initial sighting on july 6th was the most prominent, i was up at 4 am having a coffee under a great deal of duress when i looked up and witnessed a black tri angular object turn on what looked like landing lights... 
the event lasted only a few seconds but the craft it's self had made a full right handed rotation, the estimated distance agl must have been only 10'000 ft or less however the landing lights turned off immediately as i watched the craft. i suspect it had been watching the city for some time..
content.summary: Multiple objects luminous in nature followed nw to ne and se track (multiple events over july)

content.detailedDescription: A really hot day. very few clouds in the sky. my wife went in to have a shower. i decided to swim in the pool to cool off at about 8:15pm. i took off my glasses. in i went. floating on my back looking at the clouds thinking of the shapes they are making. these are cirrus clouds. wispy type of cloud. they sit at 23000+ feet (7000+m). the moon is in the south east sky but it still light out. the sun doesn't go down until about 10:00pm. there is really only 1 cloud formation in the east sky with it moving east. from my pool it was over my neighbor's house 2 doors east of us. it started out as a crab looking cloud that turned into a shark with an open mouth. i'm looking at it for about 5 minutes to see if it changes into something else. out of the gills there is movement heading west. nothing flew into the shark. it came out of the shark. at first i thought it was a plane but there was no jet stream. so i looked harder without my glasses. i need glasses for distance and details at a distance. the fact i can see this thing moving without glasses, it had to be big! it even looked like a plane as i could see what looked like the tail of a plane. it was cloud like silver/grey. as it moved west a bubble formed around the object.  you could see the edge of the circle and the cigar like body with a tail but it was transparent between the circle and the main body. this showed up while it was over our house. the circle became more dominant as it went over the next door neighbor's house then disappeared over the neighbor's house 2 doors over to the west of us. it did not streak away. it vanished. nothing. invisible? it was just gone. i kept looking for it in the clear blue sky. got out of the pool, put on my glasses and there was nothing but blue sky in the entire north and west sky. i don't know where it went and it did not disappear behind a house or tree or anything.  there was nothing blocking my view. the entire sighting was around 15 seconds.  i told my wife about this and she is freaked out about it. the next day we were out, looking at the sky and 2 different planes flew over. i took off my glasses and i can't see planes without them on. therefore this had to be big or i couldn't see it.
content.summary: Ufo out of the shark cloud - it never flew in

content.detailedDescription: Last night (july 30th, 2015) my five year old wanted to go night swimming around 11:10pm. after being outside for about a half hour, stargazing while my daughter swam, i saw a bright (and i mean bright) orange, pulsing light north-east of our home. i looked around at the other stars again and realized that this thing is not like the others. i thought maybe it was a nearby planet that came into view, tonight (july 31st, 2015) being a blue moon and all. i kept a close eye on it, the entire event lasted about 15 minutes. i noticed a plane in the sky flying over us, headed in the opposite direction of where this bright orange unidentified object was hovering. the plane looked as normal, red and blue flashing lights on the bottom with sound traveling just a few seconds behind it. i didn't hear anything from the ufo. i told my daughter to look, she saw it too. her first words were, "mommy, that's not a plane, what is it?" and of course i told her i thought it might be a planet because i didn't want to jump to conclusions. i lost sight momentarily when i looked at my daughter in the pool. when i looked back up it was no longer there. i asked her if she saw it move and she said she didn't. i continued to frantically try to find this object in the sky and i spotted it again about a minute later, slowly hovering toward the nw. there were no clouds last night that would have given this object any cover, the stars were bright, the sky was clear, and like i said, we'd been preparing for the blue moon that will occur tonight. i couldn't tell you exactly how far it went before disappearing as i was about a mile away (i assume) but after slowly heading nw, it picked up great speed very quickly and then vanished. i took my daughter into the house as soon as it disappeared and as we were walking through the backyard (which is fairly large, we live in a rural area) we heard what must have been every dog in the area barking. that's what really set it in stone for me that this had to have been an alien ufo encounter! my daughter felt scared at first but when she realized how excited i was about this possible encounter, she also became excited. i didn't notice anything after this, the time when we entered the house had to have been around 12 midnight.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Thought i was seeing a nearby planet, i was wrong!

content.detailedDescription:
While fishing on july 23rd 2015 at old inlet in bellport/brookhaven.  i snapped two pictures of my friend and his son.  a few hours later while looking at the photos we saw an un explained object in the upper left hand side of picture #2.  we heard no out of the ordinary sounds.  the object looked strange so later that day i took pictures of helicopters and different sized planes to see if i could replicate the object pictured.  i could not.  i am simply sending this off to see if anyone could have any idea of what it is or was.  strange that this object did not show up in the 1st photo, the amount of time between them was only 3-5 seconds and the speed of the object would have had to been extreme.  

i also included another picture taken about an hour later with a bird and another object further in the distance a little blurry. 

any thoughts?

thanks
rob
content.summary: 2 pictures taken within 3-5 seconds one no object the other has object

content.detailedDescription: Me and the boyfriend were heading to bed early around 10:25, went in to lay down there's no curtains on the windows because we just moved in so something caught my eye up in the sky. it wasn't like any star i've ever seen so i got up and it appeared to be moving to the east but very slowly and it was a very bright color orange and bigger then a star. so i call my boyfriend over and we're both trying to figure out what this is when it stops and starts ascending and getting dimmer. but before it's gone this bubble looking thing floats down and looks to have landed somewhere in the field outside our house. we were trying to figure out if somebody parachuted from a plane but there was no noise just silence.
content.summary: Big ball of light travelling from west to east stopped, hovered then went straight up. bubble like thing fell

content.detailedDescription: I was clicking a photo of the sky and later discovered an unknown mysterious object in my photo
content.summary: I was clicking a photo of the sky and later discovered an unknown mysterious object in my photo

content.detailedDescription: While on patrol my partner and i observed a bright light too large to be a shooting star travel at an extremely high rate of speed to the south east of our location.  the object was bright white with a green outer glow.
content.summary: Bright craft traveling at extreme speed

content.detailedDescription: I was 16 and listening to a talk radio station. in the summer i slept on a screened in porch. i noticed a bright light in the east sky. i thought plane or satellite. i was just looking straight where it appeared. then in a flash (1 second )it flew to the southern sky and stopped then totally disappeared straight up. my room was approximately 12 feet by 16 feet.The entire sighting was less than 1 minute. as fast as this thing traveled it was basically impossible for our technology then and still not possible today.This is just a theory but it was lie some anti gravity propulsion. i am a qualified aircraft electronic mechanic. i have thought about this for years at the time i wasn't an a/c electronic mechanic. i was only 16. but my training came later i know what i saw.....The impossible....
content.summary: Bright light appeared hovered.For 20 seconds shot off to the south in a straight line but traveled to south in less than 1 second then shot off and straight up and disappered

content.detailedDescription: Two friends and i had just changed the brakes on my nissan maxima in stover, missouri.  we then began our drive back towards jefferson city, missouri.  i was driving and they were passengers.  minutes into our drive, i noticed a light in the sky from the corner of my eye.  it completely frightened me.  i had never seen anything like it before.  my initial reaction was to accelerate the vehicle, which i did.  my friend noticed my anxiousness as i swerved on and off the road at a high rate of speed on this desolate and winding road.  as i hollered, "what the f**k is that?", my friend attempted to steer the car wheel.  i was not looking at the road.  i was focused on the gigantic object hovering over our heads just to the left of my vehicle.  i didn't know what it was.  i had never seen anything like it. the object was the shape of a "remote control" for a television.  it was gigantic.  along the rim of the object there were white and yellow/orange lights that alternated.  the object was appearing to come from within a dark cloud that had opened up like a doughnut.  i call it a cloud but it was much too dark to be any cloud i have ever seen.  it was if the object was coming through a worm hole.  i could only see half of the object but judging from the half i could see, i knew it's entire size was that of a football field.  it wasn't motionless.  the front of the craft was going in a circular motion while going up and down simultaneously.  i continued be in disbelief.  my friend in the passenger seat did not look towards the sky, he was busy fighting to keep the car on road by steering the wheel which i was ignoring (but pressing the gas firmly)  my other friend in the back seat said his window was foggy.  as i looked back onto the road, my friend in the back seat is heard saying, "you see that?".....I turned again and the object was gone.  my friend said he saw a bright flashing light but no object....But, we all witnessed the dark, black cloud in the sky that did not disappear.  the craft that came from the middle of it was gone but the dark cloudlike image stayed beside us all the way back to jefferson city, mo.
content.summary: "remote control" shaped object with alternating white and yellow/orange lights came appeared from inside a dark, black cloud

content.detailedDescription: I was valeting cars at the taj mahal in a.C. new jersey when after parking a car in an outside lot, i noticed an object heading n.E. directly towards the showboat casino . usually i would assume it was a helicopter but this time there was no sound. i just watched it cross the horizon right over my head. then disappear.
content.summary: Saw circle of flickering orange light passing over boardwalk absolutely like something i have never seen before.

content.detailedDescription: Ball of light in woods where we had just been. came strait up out of creek bed where we had just followed through woods. shot straight up did 90 degree turn to ne without stopping and left a light trail or tracer. i was with 2 friends and right away we thought it was a ufo. we had never seen anything like it! we were kids at the time and we never told anyone about it and never talked about it after figure people would say we were lying.
content.summary: I've had 3 sightings possible abduction.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from college, and had gotten onto interstate 40 at brinkley, arkansas traveling west.  the sun was down and the sky was dark since no moon was out, and traffic was somewhat sparse.  shortly after getting onto the interstate, i saw a cluster of lights to the southwest slowly flying over the trees on the south side of the interstate.  i pulled onto the shoulder, stopped, and got out of the car to better observe the lights.  at this point, they were nearly due south of me, moving to the east parallel to the highway.  there were four red lights, arranged in the shape of a triangular pyramid (3 making a triangle at the bottom, and one at the top completing three more triangles with the bottom lights).  in the center of each of the visible faces was a white light.  the three red lights pulsated in intensity in a seemingly random pattern, though each individual red light pulsed at the same rate.  the white lights were constant, except for one time.  because it was dark, i could not see anything besides the lights, but it appeared as though the lights were part of a single craft.  the craft moving east, with one of the bottom red lights pointed in the direction of travel.  at one point, the white light on the face opposite the direction of travel brightened for a few seconds, and when it did the craft accelerated.  when that white light returned to its original brightness, the movement of the craft returned to its original speed.  nobody else on the interstate seemed to take notice of the lights, as traffic in both directions continued unaffected.  and even though there was the sound of the traffic, there were enough gaps between vehicles that i could tell there was no apparent noise coming from the craft.  after a few minutes of watching the craft head toward the horizon, i got back in my car and continued on my way.

several days later, i was telling the event to some friends who were knowledgeable about aircraft.  with one exception, they said that the configuration of lights didn't match any known aircraft.  the one exception might be a sikorsky skycrane helicopter, and that the brightening of the light might have been one of the crew turning on a light for the cargo area.  i'm unfamiliar with the lights on a skycrane, but i am familiar with the helicopter itself - a large, heavy lift helicopter capable of carrying a small house.  in fact, i had the opportunity not long after the sighting to see one land on the quad at my college.  before i even knew it was there, i heard it fly over the building i was in.  the powerful engines and rotors shook the building so hard i thought the windows would break.  i went out front to watch the thing land about 100 yards from the entrance to the building.  i realized at that time that the craft i had seen near the interstate could not possibly have been a skycrane, because a skycrane has a definite, deafening sound, whereas the craft i had seen was completely silent.
content.summary: Lighted pyramidal object traveling parallel to interstate 40 in arkansas

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife were sitting in our driveway in lawn chairs then all the sudden we see a bright light come up and stop out nowhere it start turning very bright orange as we kept starring at it the light of the ufo started deeming then it started moving as it was doing this i was recording and taking pictures of the first one it took off slowly then another appeared and stop in the same spot bright but not so bright as the first one then it started moving in the same direction as the first one it was behind the first one about two minute apart as we were taking picture of the second one the first vantage but we look and seen a smoke turning around in a square motion as i was taking picture of the second one a third one appeared in the same spot the other two had stop in it was bright but it turn and went oppose direction this a true story but also we took the cam in the house and started looking at them unbelievable we see a image of a lady as clear as day light with long hair we have show it to other people and they can`t be leave it looking at hear with our own eyes.  we are stunned of what we caught out the sky we need a professional to see what me, wife, relatives and friends also a bishop i have the proof if you would like to see them.  does not have the latest verge on my computer sorry i will save the on a  flash drive file until someone important see them, i notified tv5 news but they was not interested the said how would we know i told them i could bring them to they news station or they could come and view them at my home they also said that they have been doing a research in area, i have the answers to their assignment and they have my name phone number just wanted to show what i caught in the sky flying around.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Stationary, with bright lights, orange and yellow then took off moving in different directions serrounding some gray fog or smoke two went south the other went back north east i have images also cam video.  you can see a lady image coming from one of them

content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately 10:25 pm on 7/30/2015. the sky was clear and i was getting ready to take the trash out. i was looking out my south kitchen window at a full moon when i saw a bright silver light over my backyard moving at an e-ne direction. at first i thought it was a star, but this star was moving at a slow speed like that of a small plane and about the same height a small plane would fly. i immediately ran out the back door to catch a glimpse and to see if i could hear any noise. there was no noise as it moved in a straight line due east-north east.

there were no blinking lights. it was just a bright light all the way around the craft. as it was just about out of sight over the horizon i noticed it looked like it was two crafts joined together as if it had the capability of separating itself if it needed to. this gave it the appearance of a cigar shape. the light was so bright coming from this craft it gave the appearance of a cigar shaped object.

i have lived in my neighborhood for approximately 25 years, so i know the flight patterns of most planes that are coming in from the local airports. i live about ten minutes from detroit metro airport in romulus, michigan, and about five minutes from willow run airport in ypsilanti, michigan, and when planes fly over on route from or to the airport they are usually coming in from a south western sky moving north-north-east, or north-north-east moving south west depending on which way the wind is blowing that night. i never see any kind of craft moving in an easterly direction unless it's a commercial airline moving west to east or vice versa, and if it is, it's so high all i see are the blinking lights.
content.summary: Light remained bright all the way around the craft. looked like it could possibly break into two different crafts.

content.detailedDescription:
This report is of an observed unusual event and not necessarily an ufo sighting.  i am the brother to the sighting person and am relaying what he observed.

prior to the observation there were an unusually large amount of small single engine airplanes in the area traveling in several different directions.  this was not normal.

at approximately 13:00 - 13:15 he observed a dark colored (black or very dark blue) twin engine airplane of approximately 18 seats (in size) approaching from the north.  airplanes very rarely approach from that direction.  it was traveling due south.  the day was cloudless at the time. while observing the aircraft it made a very steep, hard 90 degree turn left (to the east).  it traveled east for a very short period of time then disappeared (vanished). additionally the sound of the engines ended at the same time.  there was no further sight or sound from the twin engine aircraft.  no other objects were visible at the time.  after this incident, there were no other aircraft visible as prior to the event.

as a pilot myself, this strikes me as an evasive maneuver. the above check boxes pertain to the aircraft itself.
content.summary: Ufo not observed for this event. see below

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of 1965(?) i, and another class mate (mike) went to visit a girl. she lived on mcadoo near hollywood. it was in the evening. we arrived at approximately 6:00 pm and stayed until about 8:00 p.M. while walking home, as we both lived in the same general area, we were walking south on hollywood approaching poplar ave. i looked up and to my right just above the light poles saw, just across the street, this ufo. it took a moment for it to sink into my consciousness. during this interval my friend mike looked up and also saw it. we were extremely excited and continued viewing it as we walked toward poplar ave. the middle of the craft appeared as if it were made of a transparent glass like material and this area was a bright light which also had slanted black lines which moved in a counter clock wise direction inside the craft  and was visible. at times the lines would go slow and at other times they would speed up and become invisible. still at other times the lines would become viewable and vibrate, then the process would begin again. the craft was close enough that either of us could have picked up a rock and hit it. it moved slowly and without noise. there was no emission of fumes from the craft. it continued to approach the intersection of poplar ave. and hollywood until it came within approximately 130 ft and then it stopped in the air and maintained this position for about 5 minutes. then the vehicle accelerated towards overton park at a startling speed. it moved almost quicker than the eye could see or one could follow it. it appeared to be descending as it moved in this direction. we walked to the intersection and saw a memphis police car parked outside of a restaurant. we saw a middle aged officer leave the restaurant and approached him and told our tale. in a very excited manner, of course. at the end of our tale he asked to smell our breaths. he did smell our breaths and then told us to go home. when i returned to my house my parents were very upset as it was late and i told my parents and a brother and sister about the experience. of course, they thought we were crazy. as i was a young teenager i also thought it was my civic duty to report this event to the "authorities" which i did. i called the memphis airport and spoke with someone and was told there had been no unusual sightings. i am older now but have never forgotten this event. i am also retired from the memphis police department.
content.summary: Appeared in shape as the classical 2 saucers inverted with a middle area as of glass which emitted light and had some lines there. the lines vibrated and moved.

content.detailedDescription: Small dark object in the distance in the eastern sky around 8:30am i did not detect any movement.  i enlarged the image to see it better.
content.summary: I took a picture of the empty blue sky and thought it was a bird in the distance.

content.detailedDescription:
Went out on back porch to smoke, while talking on cell phone, looked up, saw a round sphere, i thought it was a large star or a planet

i always stargaze when on the porch at night.  

i thought it was a planet or star, until it moved in a strange manner.

it was a white sphere & it was stationary, then began to move, i thought it was my new glasses. i noticed it moved very slowly, in a trajectory unlike conventional aircraft or satellite. it was to my north at about 60 degrees from the horizon, when it began to move west, then it stopped.

it began to move again, & changed directions while in flight. then stopped again. i stepped inside to summon my husband.  it was stationary for 30 seconds, then it changed direction to north by west at a slow but varying speed, slowing down suddenly then speeding up then zigzagging in elevation until it disappeared from our sight in a north by northwest direction.

my husband estimated the object was no more than 40 miles from us in distance, no more than 100,000 feet above ground level.

i felt normal before the sighting, but during & after i was elated. afterwards, i felt it was a oddly coincidental, because my husband was helping my niece assemble a plastic model of a transparent, alien grey, like described in the roswell reports & had just finished assembling it when i call to him.

my husband said out loud, "you better get out of my space now!" 

we both lost sight of the sphere in the distance & cloud cover.
end of report.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sphere over graham n.C.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i walked out to our front porch because she thought she heard thunder but it turned out, she just heard my surround sound system.  we walked down our walk and looked up into the sky to see if it was clear and it was. we then noticed a solid white light with no sound, moving across the sky in a direction that differs from the flight paths we have noticed in our area. the object traveled from the west to the east. we viewed the object through the trees in our front yard. i ran inside to get my phone to try to video. my wife stayed outside and watched the object until i got back. i could still see the object when i returned and lifted my phone but nothing came through on my video. we then lost track of the object behind the trees so i ran to the road where the sky is wide open but could not find the object again. my grandson said the internet had gone out at the same time we said we were seeing the object. we felt like we saw something out of the ordinary and it was not a plane in our minds.
content.summary: Solid white light moving across the sky with no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was still in high school and the school playground and soccer field was behind my grandparents' house and behind neighbors house which is no longer there. my mother,grandmother , and neighbor lady had watched an after school  soccer match which had ended. the players had left the field and the three stood on their property side of the fence having a neighborly chat. the tioghnioga river runs parallel to the field. suddenly the three saw the object described above hovering at just above tree level above the river and they mentioned lights around the side of it. they told each other that they would tell no one due to the nature of the event. my mother and grandmother,however, did come into the house and told us all quite flabbergasted. they said it had disappeared suddenly. only my mother survives of the three and we bring up the event in discussion not infrequently all these years later.
content.summary: Object hovering over river

content.detailedDescription:
I walk my dog every night between 9:00 - 11:00 for about 15 minutes. i always watch the sky when we're walking (and have tripped many a time as a result). i like to look at the stars and hope to see a satellite because they're so different from stars and planes. i definitely know the difference between stars, planes and satellites.

i was walking the dog as usual this evening and saw a satellite. i hadn't seen one for several days so stopped to watch it. then i saw another. and another. and another. i started scanning the sky and kept seeing more and more. some were clearly closer than others with the furthest away not much larger than pinpricks. i was torn between running to tell my husband and wanting to see them before they disappeared. when i realized that they were continuing to come, all in the same trajectory from east to west, i decided to get my husband because he has an interest in such things. i ran to the house, threw the dog in, and told my husband and friend who was visiting to hurry up and come outside.

two unrelated neighbors outside heard my cries and asked what was going on.  i told them and they followed me down the street to the open area where we could see between the trees. my husband and friend were also with me. it took my husband and friend a bit of time to see the objects but one of my neighbors saw them almost immediately. as we stood watching, they just kept coming from east to west, moving steadily and silently across the sky. i can't really say if they were in formation but they were definitely in lines and were in various sizes. i imagine the small ones were higher up. if satellites travelled in packs of 50 at a variety of elevations, i'd say that's what they were.

my feelings? awe and astonishment. i was a bit wrought up because my husband suggested a few times that i "take it easy." i wasn't scared; just amazed and excited.
content.summary: Tens  (40?) of spheres at various elevations moving slowly from east to west.

content.detailedDescription:
I do not remember the exact date and can only approximate at this time, it was november or december 2011. i did carry my dpms ar15 flat top with scope and 62gr m855 ammo for about a year in the back of my toyota 4 runner after seeing the craft/ship.
i was coming home from houma, la, it was the last day of my 14 day hitch and about an 11 hour drive home. i usually try to leave around noon when leaving the houma yard to get home around midnight, stopping for a meal along the way.
i remember being cut off by a driver while getting on to 287 from i-35 after exiting i-20 in fort worth, having to hit the brakes hard and swerve sending all my stuff in the passenger seat (phones, notebooks, bottled water) into the floorboard with all the empty wrappers and other trash from the drive. i have a blue tooth device on my visor so i didn’t need to retrieve my phone and didn’t think anyone would be calling on my work phone that late on the start of my days off so i left them in the floorboard.
i got to springtown texas about 11:45 pm. no cars on the road and while stopped at the red light next to the 2 gas stations. the red light seemed like it was broken as it lasted a long time. there was a car at the station across the intersection and one to my left, no people outside. the usual several cars at the old station on the right.  i was thinking about running the light and was looking for the “cop” all the while thinking about what my wife was going to do to me that i hadn’t had done for 14 days. i had the windows down as it was a very nice night out. clear sky with a full moon, light breeze and in the lower 70’s. while at the light i noticed what appeared to be an airplane at my 10 o’clock way up in the sky over the gas station across the intersection. it turned to its left, got my attention as the lights shone brightly as it turned back towards the north east at a 45 degree angle or so it looked with me not paying that much attention to it but it looked like it accelerated. i didn’t know of any airports it could be going to as i assumed it to be a jet heading towards the dfw area before it turned around. that’s when i started noticing that maybe it hadn’t went back to the north east but down from its position in the sky as it was a light to the left of the road, i thought it could just be heading away from me but the light to the left of the road got brighter. the stop light had turned green and i was minding the speed limit but by the time i had gotten to the auto parts store i started thinking i was seeing a drug interdiction as the way it was moving “looked like” a helicopter hovering. i was expecting a search light to come on at anytime and as i got closer to the red light at the high school the light was stationary but my position to it was changing so the lights from what i assumed was a helicopter was above the street lamp and tree branch and was now below the lamp and even with the tree branch on the left hand side of the road. the moon was bright and you could start seeing an outline but there was no tail boom and the large lights down the sides and i was thinking it was a chinook rather that a huey or jet ranger. had to be a helicopter as it was hovering in the same spot for several minutes as the red light had caught me at the high school too. 
{i had been a correctional officer, a c.E.R.T member, a boy scout, rig operator in the oil field for years when the t-38’s from sheppard would buzz the pulling unit we had worked on in the 80’s, worked offshore and rode helicopters, worked as a management system auditor and rode in airplanes (747, airbus 300 and others). i can identify and tell the difference between alot of military aircraft from ww2 to present}
as the light turned green and i moved forward getting closer i could see the craft to the left of the road at about 100 foot off the ground didn’t fit any aircraft i knew of. my brain was freaking out trying to fit this craft into a logical fit. i slowed down and pulled over, turned out my headlights and killed the car at the big old dead tree over the hill from the last light coming out of springtown heading toward jacksboro on 199. the full moon was high at my direct left and this craft was over the left side of the road at an angle. it was a little further than the house on the right side of the road next to the rental yard. seeing the outline from an angle underneath it had a y configuration to it. not wings at the rear but “winglet’s” is the best description i can give.  the craft was as big as an airbus 300 to its wings with the “fuselage” being cylinder like. i say that because it was not a round cylinder, it had a slight ridge running down the length of it. like when you cut a cylinder down the middle and put it back together, no longer perfectly round but close and having a ridge. the nose was hard to see well due to the light from the 4 large “windows” on the front but it was more rounded and blunt than an airbus. the rear tapered to a cone with the winglet’s running down the rear cone forming a y. the craft was about 150ft long and 35’ in diameter and making a low noise that rose and fell in rhythm.  there were 6 to 8 large “windows” down the right hand side of the “fuselage” that were the size of a door on an airbus, not the small windows. i tried to look into the “windows” but they had very bright light coming from it, you just could not see into the craft and i tried. i watched the shadow of the craft cross the road as it started moving slowly and go across the house and the field to the right. i watched it thru my sunroof to be able to estimate its size and the width of the shadow on the ground from the moon. the time showed 11:55 pm on my clock in my toyota which is usually 10 minutes fast. i couldn’t take my eyes off the craft while shouting “what is that!??!” as i was feeling around for my phone in the floor. then i remembered my .40 cal behind the seat. the craft was moving away from me slowly, crossing over the field and heading in the direction of the stadium behind me to my right passed the trees and back over the hill. i could hit it from where i was at but if i missed or it ricocheted it could hit a house or livestock. if i shot it i’d find out what it was one way or another but knew i couldn’t bring it down i’d have to wait for the news to report that an experimental aircraft or blimp had been shot or the completely other outcome, they return fire. 
there were no rotors, no pylon motors no means to push or pull this craft thru the air that could be seen. it could have been some kind of blimp but it had no vertical stabilizers just the horizontal winglets at the rear of the fuselage and was running at night out in the country. it did had a red light on what looked like a pole coming up from the rear of the “cone” and what looked like structural “ribs” on the cone end of the fuselage. blimps have motors on pylons or pods giving it power, this had nothing and the full moon was shining on it real good. i thought about turning around and trying to cut it off on the road back from the red light towards the stadium. then the thought of my shell casings with my finger prints near a school…. not a good scenario, even if i had called the police. gun fire in the middle of the night, getting people to wake up and look. i do not know what it was that i saw but i can describe what i saw and know i saw it.  - a large aircraft “fuselage” with winglettes making a y configuration, hovering like a helicopter or blimp with no visible rotors or engines and of a design i had never seen before or since (as of 7/30/2015). 
i missed my opportunity because i was surprised by it. i waited and listened and read but i haven’t seen any word of any ufo in the area at the time. i gave a written report to one of those ufo web sites but no one contacted me or told me what i saw. i feel i was a coward at the time, scared when i saw something i’d never seen before. scared of the possibilities that could happen and no one knowing what might have happen to me. that cowardice subsided a few days after i got home and i loaded up my ar 15 with scope and green laser with several mags full of 62 gr m855 ammo. i carried this with me for the next year in the event i saw it again. next time i’ll find out what it is. i may not get to tell about it, but i will find out what it is or is not. if its military it deserves to get shot at because they should not be flying something like that close to populated areas where it could scare people and cause a wreck and if it’s a hoaxer flying a blimp at night designed to look like that to scare people……. what did they expect would happen sooner or later here in texas.
content.summary: Y configuration with 150"x 35" fusalage with winglettes at the rear. 4 "windows on front, 6 to 8 large windows down the side. very bright white light coming from all windows.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking back home from a friends house with another friend at night and we witnessed a blue sphere object in the sky fly slowly then stop and hover then took off at what i would say light speed as we witnessed the sky light up when it took off and the ufo seemed to create a line of light when taking off into space that's why i would say light speed we were in awe of what we saw i was id say extremely happy i witnessed this as i had believed in ufos and et's for long time but we have not really told people as they would not believe us
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo flew slowly hovered then took off to unknow speed

content.detailedDescription: They were coming one after the other.  my kids saw 2 of them first and came in the house to get me.  i sat and watched as 7 more came right behind them.  they were very silent
content.summary: 9 of them in a row going the same direction witnessed by my kids and i
